funding-group.funding-statement: This study was supported by the University of Northern Colorado's School of Biological Sciences. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript. The Colorado Wildlife Conservation Grant program, administered cooperatively by Colorado Parks and Wildlife and U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, and Bureau of Land Management, were generous in supporting the field research described in this paper. The City of Boulder Open Space and Mountain Parks department also was generous in funding, support, and access to their properties. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
